mapper.select: SELECT memberNickName ,cleanRating ,comfortRating ,priceRating ,qualityRating ,reviewContent ,reRegDate ,roomDetail_roomSeq as roomSeq FROM review WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.roomSeq, a.roomName, a.roomPrice, a.roomContent, a.roominfo, a.roomTypeCD, a.tvNy, a.wifiNy, a.poolNy, a.airNy, a.bathNy, a.bathSuppliesNy, a.roomRegDate, a.roomUpdate, a.roomDelny, b.cleanRating, b.comfortRating, b.priceRating, b.qualityRating, b.reviewContent, b.reRegDate, b.roomDetail_roomSeq as roomSeqF FROM roomdetail a LEFT JOIN review b on a.roomSeq = b.reviewSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.roomDetail_roomSeq=#{roomSeqF}
